title: Vendetta
description: The third in the Revenge of the Sisterhood series Having waited patiently for many years, the time has finally come for Myra Rutledge to avenge her daughter's death. Barbara died before her time in a hit-and-run accident by a politician with diplomatic immunity, and justice was never served upon the killer until now. With the help of the Sisterhood, the organisation set up by Myra to help other women who have been let down by the justice system, Myra sets out to ensure that the man in question never forgets that our actions always have consequences
author: Fern Michaels
